segments.text: Over by the cabinets, there's another situation unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is climbing on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s precariously reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly wobbly, almost tipping backwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing below, eagerly waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand outstretched, ready for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly in cahoots, secretly getting treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite audacious of them to do this right behind the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re risking such a fall for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool could collapse at any second, sending him sprawling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really shouldn't be doing this unsupervised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he hits his head or breaks something?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just watching, hoping they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
